any)

Unicron/Teufel:




Unicron hovered, watching with little interes=
t.  His forces were winning, in 
his personal opinion.  He raised both arms=
, four missiles launching out.  Two 
energy-signature seeking missiles from=
 his left arm headed for Hot Rod.

The two other missiles of the same type =
launched off heading for Iron Raptor.

"Teufel, you know what to do." he ch=
uckled.

---

"Yes, Chaos-Bringer." he replied.  Out of his shoulders exten=
ded 
double-barreled cannons.  Each cannon fired ten laser beams, a total o=
f forty 
rapid laser beams heading for Zardus.  "Die, heiden, feel the zorn=
 of the 
Br=FCderschaft!"

His left arm raised, the top of his wrist slidin=
g open to reveal a large 
barrel.  He armed the weapon, ready to fight.
